entry.title: TrueNAS Scale
entry.summary: TrueNAS Scale, today I worked on properly setting up Rsync on my servers. I currently have three (3) TrueNAS Scale servers setup; I have one setup to server Media, another setup to store my computer backups and finally one setup to act as a share network wide.

entry.title: Wireguard
entry.summary: Wireguard Today, I setup Wireguard for the first time, and after a little bit of tweeking. I now have 3 devices setup to connect directly to my homelab. As a result I have closed nearly all my external ports in my firewall, and those ports which are open are protected by a reverse proxy server. I think I will work on OpenVPN tomorrow, and get it setup as an alternative to Wireguard.
